<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Iron Lung](/Feats.aspx?ID=1231) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 74

**Archetype** [Golem Grafter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=39)

**Prerequisites**
[Golem Grafter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1227)

</column>

---

Your lungs are infused with the resilience of iron. Treat the result of your save against an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) poison as one degree of success better than you rolled. Additionally, you gain the following ability.

**Exhale Poison** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) <actions string="Two Actions" /> **Frequency** once per hour; **Requirement** You were within the area of an inhaled poison within the last minute; **Effect** You sharply exhale the poison that previously surrounded you in a 15-foot cone. Creatures in the area are affected by the poison; the poison's DC and effects are unchanged.
name: Iron Lung
